name: Environment / Base Projects
description: Working in a more professional context means, that there are some things you need to share in your group. These projects should help you with that.

projects.title: Project Template
projects.subtitle: create a project template for your group

projects.title: Runtime Environment
projects.subtitle: create a common environment for your groups projects to share configuration and logging

name: Tool Projects
description: Projects that describe tools that might be of use. They do not become part of your groups code base, but help to achieve better results faster.

projects.title: Database Based Code Generator
projects.subtitle: A code generator that reads a database table structure and generates code (in a window) for copy and paste

projects.title: SQL Code Formatter
projects.subtitle: I bet your team knows a thousand ways to format the sql. Maybe a common standard would help.

projects.title: Shared Library
projects.subtitle: Your team needs to achieve certain things in a common way. A library that supports them doing that can reduce trouble and code.

projects.title: Style Guide
projects.subtitle: A style guide that builds the html,css and javascript you need and has a good documentation, so that your apps all look and behave alike

projects.title: Provisioning Toolset
projects.subtitle: You need a way to provision production, test and development environments
